pull.title: Move wallet callbacks into cs_main (this effectively reverts #7946)
pull.body: This is an alternative to #9570 as well as at least two other fixes which would be required to wallet consistency issues generated by #7946, none of which I believe are reasonable to make 0.14.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message: Move wallet callbacks into cs_main (this effectively reverts #7946)

events.body:
utACK

I know we think this is on the top of our minds for further improvement, but I think it would make sense to document at least in the comments and maybe also the commit message why this matter.
Fixes #9584 and #9148 temporarily, with a hope for reversion in 0.15.
utACK 989989354b68d3954fe2742b96c53eeb2e8a7670. I think it make sense to apply this revert and go for a better solution in 0.15.

comments.body: I think you need to clear connectTrace.blocksConnected here.
It will be automatically when it continues the loop.
